sandstoneWarning.general: Sandstone is fragile when wet and requires significant time to dry after rain. Climbing on wet sandstone damages the rock and is unsafe.
sandstoneWarning.recentRain: Recent precipitation detected. Please ensure the rock is completely dry before climbing.

footer.description: Free climbing conditions for everyone. Built with ‚ù§Ô∏è for the climbing community.

features.heading: Everything You Need
features.subheading: Comprehensive climbing conditions at your fingertips, completely free

realTimeWeather.title: Real-time Weather
realTimeWeather.description: Accurate forecasts from Open-Meteo with sun/shade calculations for specific sectors

chatInterface.title: Chat Interface
chatInterface.description: Natural language queries powered by AI. Ask in any language, get instant answers

communityReports.title: Community Reports
communityReports.description: Share conditions, safety alerts, access changes, route info, and more. Help fellow climbers with real-time updates across multiple categories

globalCoverage.title: Global Coverage
globalCoverage.description: Any crag or sector worldwide via OpenBeta database integration

crossDeviceSync.title: Cross-Device Sync
crossDeviceSync.description: Access your favorites and chat history from any device with a secure sync key. No account required

privacyFirst.title: Privacy First
privacyFirst.description: We don't just not need your data - we don't want it! Anonymous by default. No accounts, no tracking. Your data stays yours.

privacy.heading: Privacy Policy
privacy.subheading: We don't just not need your data - we don't want it!

whatWeDontCollect.title: What We Don't Collect
whatWeDontCollect.description: No email addresses, no names, no phone numbers, no IP addresses, no analytics, no tracking pixels, no cookies (except essential ones), no user behavior tracking. We literally can't identify you.

whatYouControl.title: What You Control
whatYouControl.description: Your favorites, reports, and chat history are stored locally on your device. To access them across devices, you can create an anonymous profile. Once you have a profile, your data syncs automatically to enable multi-device access. You can delete all your data anytime from Settings.

howSyncWorks.title: How Sync Works
howSyncWorks.description: When you create a profile, we generate an anonymous sync key and sync your data to our database. Data is linked to a hashed sync key - not your identity. The sync key is a random identifier that only you have access to. We can't link it to you. No email required, no account needed.

openSource.title: Open Source
openSource.description: Our entire codebase is open source on GitHub. You can audit exactly what we do with your data (spoiler: nothing). Full transparency, zero hidden trackers.

yourRights.title: Your Rights
yourRights.description: You can delete your profile anytime from Settings. This removes your favorites, chat history, and profile from our database. Community reports you posted remain visible (anonymously) to help other climbers. Full control over your data.

dataSecurity.title: Data Security
dataSecurity.description: Sync keys are cryptographically hashed before storage. We use Supabase with Row Level Security policies. Even if our database leaked, sync keys couldn't be reverse-engineered to identify users.

footer.tldr: TL;DR: We built this app for climbers, not for data collection. Your privacy isn't a feature - it's the foundation.
